title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 95.5 - Hours for public inspection
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 95.5 - Hours for public inspection

State Regulations

Requests for public access to records shall be accepted
and records produced between 10 a.m. and 4 p.m. on all days when the Authority
is regularly open for business. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
95.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
